manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mega-Rich Nourishing Shampoo This vitamin-infused shampoo with Biotin B-7 Complex, Vitamin E and Pro Vitamin B5 leaves hair clean, nourished, stylish and healthy-looking.

Key Ingredients Biotin B-7 Complex Helps improve the appearance of body and shine for thick, healthy-looking hair. Vitamin E Provides antioxidant benefits. Pro Vitamin B5 Helps weightlessly condition and nourish the look of hair.

Suggested Usage & Study Results Using a small amount, add a little water to create a rich lather. Massage into hair and scalp and rinse. Repeat if desired, then rinse well and follow with Mega-Rich Nourishing Conditioner for hair that is soft, smooth and touchable. For external use only. In a 3-day consumer efficacy study on 34 female subjects, ranging in age from 19 to 65 (in conjunction with Mega-Rich Nourishing Conditioner): 94% agreed their hair looked shinier94% agreed their hair looked healthier94% agreed their hair looked more nourished91% agreed their hair felt clean and fresh

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I've used it for years and it's minimized my scalp breaking out.
reviews.reviewText: I've always fought with acne on my scalp having tried several shampoos. The stuff that actually worked always smelled horrible and is usually really expensive or requires a prescription. The key for me has been to wash daily. If I skip more than a day, my head tends to break out. While this stuff isn't designed for acne relief, it's done a decent job for me keeping my scalp at a fair middle ground of not too oily and not too dry.I use about a nickel sized amount daily, starting with the sides of my head (where I get the most acne) and working up my scalp, then out the length of my hair. My hair is about shoulder length.It smells clean, but subtle. You don't have to use a whole lot, and it is good for daily showers. I personally do NOT like the matching conditioner for regular use, it tends to make my hair really poofy, so I suppose it could be good to someone looking for added volume maybe. I actually stopped using it a couple years ago completely and have had better control of my hair from doing so.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cleans very well
reviews.reviewText: I started using this shampoo when I was visiting a friend. I really liked it. Not enough to buy it for myself because it's expensive. But it is a great shampoo. It cleans my oily scalp and hair effectively without leaving it dry and itchy. You don't need to use a lot of it and you can use it daily. Well, I used up all of my friend's tube and had to replace it. Maybe in the future I'll buy it for myself.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this shampoo!
reviews.reviewText: I really like this shampoo a lot. This is my second order! It has a nice scent and my hair and scalp feels great after using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very nice shampoo. I only bought it for the scent.
reviews.reviewText: I was at a Hilton in Clearwater, FL and they give you this shampoo. I loved it so much (and could only swipe a few from housekeeping!), that I bought it here. It's very expensive imo, and I have little hair (I'm a guy with a crew cut), so I can't speak to some of its qualities. I don't know how it is on long hair, for body or anything else. I bought it for the scent which I love and that's that. It's pricey for that privilege.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My husband swears by this shampoo
reviews.reviewText: This is the only shampoo my husband buys! He swears by it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Packed full of good nutrients and vitamins for your hair
reviews.reviewText: Have been using this shampoo for about a year now... just like many other commenting fans, I too first tried this while staying at a Hilton in NYC -I have fine non chemically treated hair - tend to wash every other day (unless on the weekends) - and I have had more people tell me in the past year that my hair looks great - and comment on how fast it has grown....My hairdresser (who I had not seen in several months for a long overdue trim) even commented on how healthy my hair wasI do not do anything special except treat myself to this shampoo - it is a bit pricey compared to other products on the market but a little goes a very long way - not to mention the smell is amazing and clean -The only "disappointment" I have is with the package it's self- as earlier stated, I have been using this product for about a year - a few of the bottles would not close and one of the tips actually broke off in the tube itself - so I usually have to store the bottle upside down in my shower rack... not that this a huge deal, but a bit annoying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I discovered this shampoo on accident

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I like it, but it’s ridiculously over priced.
reviews.reviewText: It seems similar to what I’ve used in nice motels. But the ingredients do differ.I like the fragrance, it is as I remembered it.A dime size amount was adequate for my shorter hair length. So the tube will last somewhat longer than a larger container of another product.I didn’t notice any damage or any negative results to my hair, a couple of reviews noted.It’s just way too expensive.(Update: I found it on Walmart.com for about 5 bucks cheaper.)
An excellent shampoo.Leaves my hair shinning and scalp clean.

reviews.reviewTitle: Excellent produit qui fortifie les cheveux
reviews.reviewText: Produit : Peter Thomas Roth Mega-Rich™ Shampoing 235mlDescription : J'ai découvert ce produit suite à un voyage, j'avais d'abord essayé le tube échantillon. J'ai été convaincue. Ce shampoing fortifie les cheveux et donne une réelle impression d'épaisseur.👍🏻 Les plus :- Une sensation réelle de cheveux plus épais.- Un parfum agréable et discret.👎🏻 Les moins :- Le prix est un peu élevé par rapport aux autres produits du marché.📦 Packaging : Le tube de shampoing est emballé dans une boîte en carton.
Champú con biotina, mejora el crecimiento del cabello.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on June 8, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Excellent shampoo. First used it in a hotel. Not available on ahops
